content: crochet drawstring pouch pattern pdf beginner friendly discover the joy of creating your own crochet drawstring pouch with this beginner-friendly pdf pattern featuring single_crochet back loop only stitches this design offers a stunning texture suitable for everyone the pattern is easy to follow using continuous rounds to maintain a tidy seamless finish perfect for personal use gifts or donations this pouch is versatile enough to store various items recommended yarn is 4 weight cotton or cotton blends for optimal durability and ease of care customize the pouch size effortlessly by adjusting the starting chains download this pdf pattern on ravelry and start your crochet journey with a project that s both functional and fun ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification there is a complete video tutorial for both left and right handed crocheters included in this pdf ❤ size approx 4 5 wide by 7 tall as written
